Question: It involves eliciting information from the customer about the work environment, or domain, in which the final product will function in life cycle.
It is the first activity that has a high-level decomposition of the system into components that can either be brought in from existing software products or be developed from scratch independently.
It is an architectural design that provides a decomposition of the system description that allows for isolated development of seperate components which will later be integrated.
It is a detailed design for a component of the system should be in such a form that it is possible to implement it in some executable programming language.
It is once enough components have been implemented and individually tested, they must be integrated as described in the architectural design.
It is all work on the system is considered under the category of maintenance, until such time as a new version of the product demands a total redesign or the product is phased out entirely
It is the ultimate test of usability based on measurement of user experience. It demands that specific usability measures be made explicit as requirements
4 Specifications of Usability
CorrectAnswer: Usability Attribute/Principle, Measuring Concept, Measuring Method, New Level/Worst Case/PlannedLevel/BestCase

Question: It is a usability specification that requires level of detail that may not be possible early in design satisfying a usability specification does not necessarily satisfy usability
It overcomes inherent problems of incomplete requirements
4 management issues in Iterative design
Four Main Phases in Software Process + the Iteration Loop that is focused on the design of interaction
CorrectAnswer: What is wanted, Analysis, Design, Prototype, Implement and Deploy

Question: It is the first stage in four main phases of software process that is establishing what exactly is needed
It is the result of observation and interview in 4 main phases in software cycle, need to be ordered in some way to bring out key issues and communicate with later stages of design.
The central stage in 4 main phases of software cycle when you move from what you want, how to do it.
Tt is the process in 4 main phase of software cycle that the system is producing its early version to try out with real users
The last phase in 4 main phase of Software Cycle that after the design, it is needed to be create and deploy. It involves writing code, documentations and manual
